A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
This movie is the worst Star Wars movie of all time.  
At least The Phantom Menace felt like a Star Wars movie(it was just bad).   
This movie feels like a "Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them" fan fiction. The first exchange of dialogue in the movie is an attempt at comedy!!! A yo mama joke????? really????  
Finn having his spine slashed open in the previous movie is thrown out the window and is never brought up again. Leia turns into Mary Poppins.  
Absolute DISRESPECT for original cast and characters.  
This movie had no storyline. From the start of the movie to the end of the movie nothing has changed except for 2 characters dying. That's it.  
Horrible CGI. Jam packed with merchandise teases.  
Horrible dialogue.  
Every time the scene started to have real impact\, they destroyed the mood with a stupid joke. "REACH OUT WITH YOUR FEELINGS".  
I thought this film was marketed as "a darker script"!???????!?  
So bad and all the reviewers are paid off.  
Disgraceful.
